Posts.Content: Hi wonder if any 1 can help I had a mastecomy  16th October  and I'm currently having chemo and herceptine every 3rd cycle I'm getting lots of pain I'm my left side think it' my overaries my last period was horrendous and had to even change my during chemo as bleed so much I'm now been told they are referrng me to get my ovaries checked has this happened to any1 I'm so confused I know my breast cancer is her2 positive so could This be why
Posts.Title: Being refered to get ovarie checked after mastecomy and getting c...

Posts.Content: Thank you for your response I know I shouldn't jump the gun it's just I have awful feeling about it I might be just being paroniod  or even scared it's defo a long wait but as for my surgery I couldn't be more pleased with everything and my mobility is great I'm keeping up with the exercise daily and really pleased how far I have come in a week thank you  Love patsy xcc
Posts.Title: Waiting for results after mastecomu

Posts.Content: I had my mastecomy on the 16th October I got to say it wasn't as bad as I thought it was going be  the part I'm struggling with is waiting for the result on the 1st November the consultant  has informed me im.her2positive ER  positive  sand 8 /8 the tumor was only.2cm but I'm nowrealy scared what they will find consultant has said it has been caught early has any1 been told this then been blown by a bomb shell and got bad results finding it very hard to relax hate the waiting game  Love  Patsy xcc
Posts.Title: Waiting for results after mastecomu

Posts.Content: Aww that' brilliant news you done it girl I'm hoping you can now embrace your life and be proud of how far you have come and want to thank you for the surport  you have given me  I have just been to see my oncologist 1st time today  to tell me my treatment plan I'm getting 12 weeks of chemo and a year of herceptin I'm hoping I can be as strong as you heard to many happy healthy years  Love patsy xxx
Posts.Title: Last Herceptin done! thank you
